text: Kaper is a Dutch surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Bronisław Kaper (1902–1983), Polish film composer * Hans G. Kaper (born 1936), Dutch- American mathematician * Jacobus Kaper (born 1931), biochemist and virologist * Tasso J. Kaper (born 1964), American mathematician Category:Dutch-language surnames
title: Kaper
